externalDocs.description:
Welcome to the Open Banking Open Data API specification. This is a working draft
reflecting the progress of the Implementation Entity Working Group.

head.description: Retrieve metadata about the current set of all FCA personal current account.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data
only if modified since a given date

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only
if the given Etag value does not match

200.description:
Success. Returns metadata about this resource via HTTP headers. No actual content is returned
when this method is invoked.

Strict-Transport-Security.description: Ensures that the endpoint will only be accessed via HTTPS, for a period of up to one year.

X-Frame-Options.description: Ensures that the content served by this endpoint cannot be loaded in an embedded IFRAME element.

ETag.description: Textual value used for determining freshness of content being served.

X-Content-Type-Options.description: Ensures each page has a content type and prevents browsers from doing MIME type sniffing

400.description: Failure. You have sent a request which could not be understood.

408.description: Failure. Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

429.description: Failure. You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

500.description: Failure. An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.

503.description: Failure. The service is temporarily unavailable.

get.description: Retrieve information about all FCA personal current account.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data
only if modified since a given date

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only
if the given Etag value does not match

X-Frame-Options.description: Ensures that the content served by this endpoint cannot be loaded in an embedded IFRAME element.

ETag.description: Textual value used for determining freshness of content being served.

X-Content-Type-Options.description: Ensures each page has a content type and prevents browsers from doing MIME type sniffing

enum: Use of the APIs and any related data will be subject to the terms of the Open Licence and subject to terms and conditions

items.title: FCA Personal Current Account

Notes.title: Notes
Notes.description: Specify any note that helps Banks to describe the Service Metrics Data related to a particular Brand. One example to describe, why the Service Metrics data is not available.

OpeningTime.title: OpeningTime
OpeningTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar day expressed in either UTC time format (hh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (hh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (hh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

ClosingTime.title: ClosingTime
ClosingTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar day expressed in either UTC time format (hh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (hh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (hh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

400.description: Failure. You have sent a request which could not be understood.

408.description: Failure. Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

429.description: Failure. You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

500.description: Failure. An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.

503.description: Failure. The service is temporarily unavailable.

head.description: Retrieve metadata about the current set of all FCA business current account.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data
only if modified since a given date

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description:
Used for conditional request, to retrieve data only
if the given Etag value does not match

200.description:
Success. Returns metadata about this resource via HTTP headers. No actual content is returned
when this method is invoked.

Strict-Transport-Security.description: Ensures that the endpoint will only be accessed via HTTPS, for a period of up to one year.

X-Frame-Options.description: Ensures that the content served by this endpoint cannot be loaded in an embedded IFRAME element.

ETag.description: Textual value used for determining freshness of content being served.

X-Content-Type-Options.description: Ensures each page has a content type and prevents browsers from doing MIME type sniffing

400.description: Failure. You have sent a request which could not be understood.

408.description: Failure. Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

429.description: Failure. You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

500.description: Failure. An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.

503.description: Failure. The service is temporarily unavailable.

OpeningTime.title: OpeningTime
OpeningTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar day expressed in either UTC time format (hh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (hh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (hh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

ClosingTime.title: ClosingTime
ClosingTime.description:
A particular point in the progression of time in a calendar day expressed in either UTC time format (hh:mm:ss.sssZ), local time with UTC offset format (hh:mm:ss.sss+/-hh:mm), or local time format (hh:mm:ss.sss). These representations are defined in "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition - W3C Recommendation 28 October 2004" which is aligned with ISO 8601.
Note on the time format:
1) beginning / end of calendar day
00:00:00 = the beginning of a calendar day
24:00:00 = the end of a calendar day
2) fractions of second in time format
Decimal fractions of seconds may be included. In this case, the involved parties shall agree on the maximum number of digits that are allowed.

400.description: Failure. You have sent a request which could not be understood.

408.description: Failure. Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

429.description: Failure. You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

500.description: Failure. An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.

503.description: Failure. The service is temporarily unavailable.

example.title: Bad request
example.description: You have sent a request which could not be understood.

enum: You have sent a request which could not be understood.

example.title: Client timeout
example.description: Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

enum: Your client has failed to submit a request, and a timeout has occurred.

example.title: Too many requests
example.description: You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

enum: You have requested this resource too often. Slow down.

example.title: Internal server error
example.description: An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.

enum: An error occurred on the server. No further information is available.
